name: PROJECT MAZE
description: Challenge yourself and beat the maze alone or with your friends.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Core 2 ~2.0Ghz Duo Processor or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 540M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel Core i5 ~3.0Ghz Processor or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
